com.starsoft.simpleandroidasynclibrary.core.lifeciclesupport.executorproviders

Class LifeCycleExecutors

  • com.starsoft.simpleandroidasynclibrary.core.lifeciclesupport.executorproviders.LifeCycleExecutors

  • public class LifeCycleExecutors

    • Constructor Detail

      • LifeCycleExecutors

        public LifeCycleExecutors()

    • Method Detail

      • getSingleThreadPool

        @NotNull
public static SingleThreadPool getSingleThreadPool(@NotNull
                                                             androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner $this$getSingleThreadPool)

        Extension for LifecycleOwner creates the Executor which keeps track of the life cycle (which shutdown in onDestroy) Providing Executor as a new thread pool with a single thread

        Returns:
        ThreadPoolExecutor with a single thread, keeps track of the life cycle (shutdown in onDestroy)
        See Also:
        Executor, Executor

      • getMultiThreadPoll

        @NotNull
public static MultiThreadPool getMultiThreadPoll(@NotNull
                                                           androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner $this$getMultiThreadPoll)

        Extension for LifecycleOwner creates the Executor which keeps track of the life cycle (which shutdown in onDestroy) Providing Executor as a new thread pool with a starting number of threads equal to the number of processors + 1 and a maximum number of threads equal to the number of processors * 2.

        Returns:
        ThreadPoolExecutor with a with a starting number of threads equal to the number of processors + 1 and a maximum number of threads equal to the number of processors * 2, keeps track of the life cycle (shutdown in onDestroy)
        See Also:
        Executor, Executor

      • getThread

        @NotNull
public static SingleThreadExecutor getThread(@NotNull
                                                       androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner $this$getThread)

        Extension for LifecycleOwner creates the Executor which keeps track of the life cycle (which interrupt in onDestroy) Providing Executor as a new thread created for execution each time

        Returns:
        Executor that uses a new thread to perform a task, keeps track of the life cycle (interrupt in onDestroy)
        See Also:
        Executor, Executor

      • getHandlerThread

        @JvmOverloads
 @NotNull
public static HandlerThreadExecutor getHandlerThread(@NotNull
                                                                               androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner $this$getHandlerThread,
                                                                               @NotNull
                                                                               java.lang.String id)

        Extension for LifecycleOwner creates the Executor which keeps track of the life cycle (which quit in onDestroy) Providing Executor as a new HandlerThread created for execution each time

        Parameters:
        id - Id for this HandlerThread
        Returns:
        Executor that uses a HandlerThread to perform a task, keeps track of the life cycle (quit in onDestroy) this HandlerThread is returned running and does not require calling the start method
        See Also:
        Executor, Executor, HandlerThread

      • getHandlerThread

        @JvmOverloads
 @NotNull
public static HandlerThreadExecutor getHandlerThread(@NotNull
                                                                               androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner $this$getHandlerThread)

        Extension for LifecycleOwner creates the Executor which keeps track of the life cycle (which quit in onDestroy) Providing Executor as a new HandlerThread created for execution each time

        Returns:
        Executor that uses a HandlerThread to perform a task, keeps track of the life cycle (quit in onDestroy) this HandlerThread is returned running and does not require calling the start method
        See Also:
        Executor, Executor, HandlerThread
